abstract: Goldman Sachs’ next big Silicon Valley move after Facebook is AppSense, a company creating user virtualization technology, a deal discussed in this CNBC video.
snippet: Goldman Sachs’ next big Silicon Valley move after Facebook is AppSense, a company creating user virtualization technology, a deal discussed in this CNBC video.
lead_paragraph: Goldman Sachs’ next big Silicon Valley move after Facebook is a $70 million investment in AppSense, a company providing user-personalization technology. User virtualization allows user-specific information to be accessed independent of a desktop.
